subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Alert,
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
The bible has been hacked into oblivion, I think. It's origins are the
middle east, notorious for treating women very badly, and notorious for
their f'd up religions.

 I do have personal experience with some deity, certainly not the guy from
bible, as well as angels, and I still wouldn't step foot in a church. You
would be wise to be a bit more reverent. Try Native American Religion, you
might find more enlightening.
 I just tinker with this junk and got intrigued with the voices--other than
that I don't really care! Everyone gets on these stupid ego trips for
reasons I can't comprehend, and it's not just boxes, everyone does it for
one stupid thing or another.

 F-S

>

> makes you an expert on tribal religon versus Quantum physics.
>
> Personally I believe the god of the bible is a savage evil god who really
> is the devil...if he were real. Don't beieve me? Have you ever read the old
> testament? Did you know that over 400 virgin girls were given to the priests
> during one raid for slavery? Hmmm, I wonder what those holy priests used so
> many little girls for?
>
> Could you go into a town and murder all women and children (drive swords
> thu them) and then take them outside and put them in a pile and burn them?
> Does that sound like a loving god? The hebrews were wild savages that
> decimated a town, commited atrocities worse than hitler all in the name of
> what a self proclaimed Jealous god?
>
> stick to your box but please don't try to save us from the
> anti-christ.....by the way, jesus was not a christian. He was a jewish.
>
> Research Constantine, he was the gay emperor that killed his wife, brother
> and son and chose to put together the books of the new testament. He
> required that all believe and follow this religion or be put to death.
>
> Im just saying that this group is about EVP not about snowfire saving our
> sould from the debil.
>

>    Easy to claim one is all modern and sophisticated, that all is known,
> there are no demons, gods,or angels. Easy to forget, modern man doesn't know
> squat! All your science, all your universities, all your "logic"--nothing!
> Y'all don't know anythin'!
>
>   Awhile back I had an experience where I was awakened in the middle of
> the night to what seemed to be some entity crawling up inside my body
> starting at my feet, accompanied by weird visions/hallucinati ons, unable to
> move. Easy to dismiss as dreams, maybe a bit of undigested beef-to quote
> scrooge, but none of my usual protection stuff worked, till I thought
> "Jesus!" The thing lifted it's head and took off. I'm still not a believer,
> but I'm not a total rejector either. There has been times when I needed
> "His" help, and was answered, plus, what I guess were angels, in open air
> "Frank, He heard you". I don't believe in the church crap, but God is out
> there!  Not only that, is been ":scientifically" -as close to -proven as
> possible-- that the Shoud of Turin is in fact waht it appears to be--Jesus!
> Same question, what the hell kind of evidence will you find acceptable?
>
>  Some here will still insist all is known, and they are in fact the most
> advanced being the universe has ever seen--they have a great deal to learn!
> I try to tolerate their arrogance, but my patience is gone for that stuff.
> When they get over their name calling, maybe they will be allowed to post.
>
>  Frank-S
